class.name: ResourceImporterVideo
class.brief_description: Imports a video file for playback.
class.description: Uses an external FFmpeg command to import from common video container files like mp4, mkv, avi, webm, mov, mpg, mpeg, etc., to Ogg/Theora. The supported video decoders will depend on the FFmpeg version used.

members.member: If filled, it will be added to the command line, after the input file and before any other arguments.
Replace the alpha channel with a color for applying the Chroma key effect.
Audio quality setting for lossy Vorbis encoding.
Encoding speed level, higher values will speed up imports and decrease compression efficiency.
Max keyframe interval (GOP) used for encoding to Theora.
Scale height to pixels if width != -1, or keep aspect ratio otherwise.
Scale width to pixels if width != -1, or keep aspect ratio otherwise.
Video quality setting for lossy theora encoding.
